trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There were no other sightings in Aurora on or around January 12th 2010
Summary: A huge flash of light way up very high
divs: Sighting DetailsStepped out of the house to take the garbage out. Glanced up at the night sky straight overhead, and the very moment I looked up, there was this huge light flash way up in the sky, and then nothing. I heard nothing, saw nothing more. The span of the light was too big and too high up to have been a landing light from a plane. Some may call it a "blink" but it was only one blink and it was not like a twinkle. The flash was huge, it covered an enormous portion of the sky for that one second.
